scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive

_Package-Notes.npm-run-all: This allows us to run two scripts in parallel
_Package-Notes.husky: makes it easy to use githooks as if they are npm scripts.
_Package-Notes.lint-staged: allows us to run scripts on staged files in git.
_Package-Notes.node-sass-chokidar: At the time of compiling this project there were performance issues with node-sass which node-sass-chokidar resolves
